Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: Hi guys, we want to officialize our candidacy for re-election of our North America Region node. Remember that we depend a lot on these nodes to have continuity of our business and dont receive any further investment other than the revenue from our services and these notary nodes. We leave our proposal attached to this message so that you can take a look and share it with your peers. We count with your vote!
